text.title: Boko Haram attack in Nigerian city kills at least fifteen
text.head: Boko Haram attack in Nigerian city kills at least fifteen
Sources

list.item: AFP. "Boko Haram attacks key northeast city in Nigeria: residents" — Yahoo! News , December 27, 2015
AP. "Boko Haram suicide bomber attack kills at least 15, say witnesses" — CBC News , December 27, 2015
